snippet.title: 10 Cheating Scandals That RUINED Careers
snippet.description:
From Hollywood to the newsroom, these affairs came with a steep professional price tag! Join us as we count down the most notorious infidelity scandals that sent careers spiraling downward. Our list features celebrities whose wandering eyes cost them more than just their marriages - it cost them their reputations and livelihoods too! Our countdown includes Tiger Woods' multi-billion dollar endorsement loss, Ingrid Bergman being blacklisted from Hollywood, Ned Fulmer's Try Guys dismissal, Rupert Sanders and Kristen Stewart's affair, and many more scandalous stories of love gone wrong. Which career-ending affair shocked you the most? Let us know in the comments below!
